EmailTemplate.subject: Delivering on the Promise of AI Ops
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Do you ever feel like you and your IT team are focused solely on putting out fires and that you have minimal time left for innovation? Turbonomic can help.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]>
The challenges of today require more than traditional scripting and orchestration. They demand AI-powered infrastructure that offers decision automation. With the Turbonomic platform, IT organizations across industries can adopt trustworthy, full-stack automation and get back to innovation.
Here's how <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1]]> we can help.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
